Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen Ai being more accessible than a teacher is good for quick thoughts and ideas to consider. A teacher will give actual meaningful feedback that will greatly improve learning

Question 41.Response: Feedback from teachers is much more meaningful and important I feel.
